005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.ListOptions;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.impl.AbstractMarkupWriter;
011
012import java.util.Map;
013
014import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
015import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
016import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter;
017
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
019
020// TODO: Is this orphaned code needed?
021public class MarkupXmlStreamWriter
022    extends AbstractMarkupWriter<XMLStreamWriter, XMLStreamException> {
023
024  /**
025   * Construct a new markup stream writer.
026   *
027   * @param namespace
028   *          the XML namespace to use for markup elements
029   * @param listOptions
030   *          options controling markup list output
031   * @param writer
032   *          the writer used to serialize markup
033   */
034  public MarkupXmlStreamWriter(
035      @NonNull String namespace,
036      @NonNull ListOptions listOptions,
037      @NonNull XMLStreamWriter writer) {
038    super(namespace, listOptions, writer);
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public void writeEmptyElement(QName qname, Map<String, String> attributes) throws XMLStreamException {
043    XMLStreamWriter stream = getStream();
044    stream.writeEmptyElement(qname.getNamespaceURI(), qname.getLocalPart());
045
046    for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : attributes.entrySet()) {
047      stream.writeAttribute(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
048    }
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public void writeElementStart(QName qname, Map<String, String> attributes) throws XMLStreamException {
053    XMLStreamWriter stream = getStream();
054    stream.writeStartElement(qname.getNamespaceURI(), qname.getLocalPart());
055
056    for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : attributes.entrySet()) {
057      stream.writeAttribute(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
058    }
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public void writeElementEnd(QName qname) throws XMLStreamException {
063    getStream().writeEndElement();
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public void writeText(CharSequence text) throws XMLStreamException {
068    getStream().writeCharacters(text.toString());
069
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  protected void writeHtmlEntityInternal(String entityText) throws XMLStreamException {
074    getStream().writeEntityRef(entityText);
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  protected void writeComment(CharSequence text) throws XMLStreamException {
079    getStream().writeComment(text.toString());
080  }
081}
